page.title: 14FARMER
page.content: cont., to unload it into the barn. Then they to the field to collect another load. At 1.30pm the farmers wife brings juice,biscuits and cake. After lunch the farmer carrys on bailing until 3.30pm when he goes to collect the children from school. When he comes back the farmer collects the cows to be milked. The farmer finishes this at about 7pm. He feeds the calves and comes in around 7.30pm. The children have already started their tea. When the farmer comes in the wife goes out to feed the goat kids. At 8pm the children are put to bed. When the are put to bed the parents have their tea and time to be on their own. They go to bed around 10pm.
